name: Baby Walker
description: The Baby Walker provides a safe and supportive way for your little one to take their first steps. With adjustable height and a sturdy frame, it ensures comfort and stability while promoting motor skill development. Fun, interactive toys on the walker encourage play and learning, making it perfect for your baby’s early walking journey.

name: Baby Einstein Activity Table
description: The Baby Einstein Activity Table is an interactive play station that introduces your little one to colors, numbers, and music. With lights, sounds, and engaging toys, it helps stimulate sensory development and fine motor skills. Ideal for babies learning to stand, this table provides hours of fun while promoting cognitive growth.

name: Baby Einstein Activity Jumper
description: The Baby Einstein Activity Jumper provides endless entertainment and learning opportunities for your little one. Designed with a rotating 360-degree seat, it allows babies to explore a variety of engaging toys, sounds, and lights that stimulate cognitive development and motor skills. The adjustable height settings ensure it grows with your baby, while the sturdy frame provides a safe and secure bouncing experience. With interactive music, colorful characters, and multiple sensory activities, this jumper keeps babies active, happy, and learning through play.

name: Angelcare Baby Bath Support
description: The Angelcare Baby Bath Support provides a safe, comfortable, and stress-free bathing experience for your little one. Designed with soft, mildew-resistant mesh, it gently cradles your baby while allowing water to flow freely for easy rinsing. The ergonomic shape offers head and back support, ensuring a secure and relaxing bath time. Lightweight and easy to store, this bath support is perfect for both sinks and tubs, making it an essential for newborn care.

name: Boon Soak 3 Stage Baby Bathtub
description: The Boon Soak 3-Stage Baby Bathtub grows with your little one, providing a safe and comfortable bathing experience from newborn to toddler. Designed with an adjustable support bump and contoured back, it ensures a secure fit at every stage. The built-in temperature gauge helps maintain the perfect water temperature, while the compact, non-slip design fits in most sinks and tubs. Easy to clean and drain, this versatile tub makes bath time simple and stress-free.

name: Baby Car Safety Mirror
description: The Baby Car Safety Mirror allows you to keep an eye on your little one while driving without turning around. Designed for rear-facing car seats, this wide-angle mirror provides a clear view of your baby at all times. The adjustable straps ensure a secure fit on most headrests, and the shatterproof design adds an extra layer of safety. Easy to install and reposition, it’s a must-have for peace of mind on the road.

name: Bumbo Seat
description: The Bumbo Seat provides a secure, comfortable seating solution for your baby as they begin to sit up. Made from soft, durable foam, it offers support and stability, helping your little one develop core strength. Lightweight and portable, it’s perfect for use for traveling families.

name: Bumbo Playtop Safari Suction Tray
description: The Bumbo Playtop Safari Suction Tray provides an engaging play experience for your little one. Featuring a bead maze, flipbook with a mirror page, rotating ball, and a spinning, clicking elephant toy, it keeps babies entertained while promoting fine motor skills. The strong suction cups ensure a secure grip on smooth surfaces, making it perfect for use on Bumbo seats, highchairs, or tabletops. With a built-in cup and snack holder, this tray combines fun and convenience for mealtimes and playtime.

name: ComfyBumpy Ergonomic Baby Bouncer Seat
description: Designed for comfort and support, the ComfyBumpy Ergonomic Baby Bouncer Seat soothes your little one with gentle, natural bouncing. Its ergonomic design provides proper back and neck support, ensuring a safe and cozy experience. Lightweight and foldable, it's perfect for home use or on-the-go convenience.

name: Boppy Nursing Pillow
description: The Boppy Nursing Pillow provides essential support for both mom and baby during feeding time. Its ergonomic design helps position the baby at a comfortable height, reducing strain on the back, neck, and arms. Soft yet firm, this versatile pillow also doubles as a support aid for tummy time and sitting practice. With a removable, machine-washable cover, it’s easy to keep clean, making it a must-have for nursing and bonding with your little one.

name: Baby Gate
description: Ensure safety at any location with the Baby Gate, designed to prevent your little one from accessing hazardous areas. Easy to install and adjustable to fit different openings, providing secure protection at your hotel/Airbnb or at any location needed.

name: Baby Brezza Bottle Warmer
description: The Baby Brezza Bottle Warmer ensures perfectly warmed milk or formula with its advanced warming technology. Featuring two modes—gentle water bath and quick steam heat—it preserves nutrients while providing fast, even heating. Compatible with most bottle brands, it’s an essential for busy parents looking for a hassle-free feeding experience.

name: Dr Browns Bottle Sterilizer
description: Dr. Brown’s Bottle Sterilizer effectively eliminates 99.9% of bacteria and germs, ensuring a hygienic feeding experience for your baby. Designed to fit multiple bottles and accessories at once, it uses steam heat for thorough sterilization. With an easy-to-use operation and automatic shut-off, this sterilizer makes bottle cleaning safe, quick, and convenient.

name: Graco Ready2Jet Compact Stroller
description:
The Graco Ready2Jet Compact Stroller is built for effortless travel, featuring a sleek, lightweight design and a one-hand fold system. With a reclining seat, smooth maneuverability, and ample storage, it provides a comfortable and hassle-free strolling experience for parents and little ones.

Attention: When renting this stroller, please be aware that we have a policy regarding the use of sunblock. To prevent staining or damaging the stroller’s surfaces, always use a cloth or towel to cover any areas that come into contact with skin treated with sunblock. For complete details, please read our full policy here: [link]

name: Baby Trend Jogger Stroller
description:
The Baby Trend Jogger Stroller is perfect for active parents, featuring large bicycle tires and a front swivel wheel for easy maneuverability. With a reclining seat, five-point harness, and ample storage space, it provides a smooth and comfortable ride for jogging or everyday outings.

Attention: When renting this stroller, please be aware that we have a policy regarding the use of sunblock. To prevent staining or damaging the stroller’s surfaces, always use a cloth or towel to cover any areas that come into contact with skin treated with sunblock. For complete details, please read our full policy here: [link]

name: Baby Trend Ride on Stroller Board
description: The Baby Trend Ride-On Stroller Board easily attaches to most strollers, allowing an older child to stand and ride along. With a sturdy, slip-resistant surface and smooth-glide wheels, it provides a safe and fun way for siblings to travel together.

name: Antilop Baby High Chair
description: The Antilop Baby High Chair by Ikea is a simple and practical solution for feeding time. With its sturdy frame, easy-to-clean design, and removable tray, it provides comfort and convenience for both baby and parents. Lightweight and affordable, it's perfect for everyday use.

name: Ostrich Lounge Chairs
description: With 5 chair positions and 3 footrest adjustments, find your perfect angle for sun-soaked comfort at the beach. This chair includes a removable lumbar pillow and padded footrest for added relaxation. Stay comfortable while sunbathing with our patented open-and-close face cavity and arm holes. Bask in the sun, read, or sip your favorite drink effortlessly. This outdoor beach lounger sits 12 inches above the ground for easy egress, includes a side bag for your essentials, and boasts an attached cup holder on the wooden armrest. Plus, itcomes with a carry strap for hassle-free transportation.,

name: Tommy Bahama High Boys
description: The Tommy Bahama High Boys Backpack Beach Chair offers ultimate comfort and convenience for beach days. Featuring adjustable reclining positions and padded shoulder straps, it easily converts into a backpack for hands-free carrying. Its durable frame and high seating height make it perfect for enjoying the view and relaxing by the water.

name: Tommy Bahama Kids Beach Chair
description: The Tommy Bahama Kids Beach Chair is perfect for your child's beach adventures. Designed with fun, vibrant colors and a durable frame, it offers a comfortable seat with adjustable recline and a convenient cup holder. Lightweight and easy to carry, it’s ideal for trips to the beach or park.

name: Tommy Bahama Backpack Beach Chair
description: The Tommy Bahama Backpack Beach Chair combines comfort and convenience with its lightweight design and adjustable features. Perfect for a day at the beach, it includes padded shoulder straps for easy carrying and multiple reclining positions for ultimate relaxation.

name: Ostrich 3N1 Lounge Chair
description: The Ostrich 3N1 Lounge Chair offers versatile comfort with three different configurations. Whether you want to sit upright, recline, or lie flat, this chair adapts to your preferred position. Features include a removable lumbar pillow, padded footrest, and convenient side storage bag.

name: Beach Bub USA Umbrella
description: The Beach Bub USA Umbrella provides excellent sun protection with its large canopy and UV-resistant material. Designed for stability in windy conditions, it features a sturdy base system and easy setup mechanism. Perfect for family beach days.

name: Ammsun Umbrella
description: The Ammsun Umbrella offers superior sun protection with its large 8-foot canopy and UPF 50+ rating. Features include air vents for better stability in windy conditions, a sturdy pole system, and easy transport with the included carrying bag.

name: Igloo 12qt Regular Cooler
description: The Igloo 12qt Regular Cooler is perfect for small outings and quick trips. Compact and efficient, it can hold up to 18 cans while keeping your beverages and snacks chilled. Features a convenient dry storage compartment in the lid for keys and cell phone.

name: Igloo 16qt Rolling Cooler
description: The Igloo 16qt Rolling Cooler combines convenience with portability. Equipped with sturdy wheels and a telescoping handle, it effortlessly rolls along with you. Can hold up to 22 cans, making it ideal for family outings and beach days.

name: Igloo 28/30qt Rolling Cooler
description: The Igloo 28/30qt Rolling Cooler offers ample space and easy mobility. Designed to hold up to 41 cans, it's perfect for longer trips and gatherings. Its durable wheels and handle make transport a breeze for outdoor adventures.

name: Igloo 28/30qt Regular Cooler
description: The Igloo 28/30qt Regular Cooler is spacious and practical for medium-sized gatherings. With a capacity to hold up to 41 cans, it keeps drinks and snacks cool and refreshing. Its sturdy construction ensures reliability for any event.

name: Igloo 60qt Rolling Cooler
description: The Igloo 60qt Rolling Cooler provides maximum capacity and mobility. Can hold up to 90 cans, making it ideal for large gatherings and camping trips. Heavy-duty wheels and telescoping handle allow for easy transport wherever you go.

name: Cressi Snorkel Mask & Tube
description: The Cressi Snorkel Mask and Tube set brings together vintage charm and modern functionality. Features a durable tempered glass lens for clear underwater views and a comfortable adjustable strap. The snorkel tube has a flexible design with splash guard top for effortless breathing.

name: Cressi Snorkel Vest
description: The Cressi Snorkel Vest ensures safety and comfort in the water. Made from durable lightweight materials for buoyancy and ease of movement. Features adjustable waist and crotch strap for secure fit, bright color for high visibility, and oral inflation tube for adjustable buoyancy.

name: Stearns Puddle Jumper
description: The Stearns Puddle Jumper helps your child build confidence in the water. Features a unique design combining a comfortable vest and attached arm bands for excellent buoyancy and freedom of movement. Made from durable soft fabric with adjustable buckle strap. Coast Guard approved for swimming and boating activities.

name: Infant Life Jacket
description: Ensure your little one's safety on the water with our Infant Life Jacket. Designed for ultimate security and comfort with a snug fit, durable zipper, and adjustable chest strap. Bright color and reflective strips enhance visibility. Perfect for boating and swimming activities for infants up to 30 lbs.

name: Kids Life Jacket
description: Keep your child safe and confident in the water with our Kids Life Jacket. Features adjustable straps for secure and comfortable fit. Bright color and reflective accents ensure high visibility. Sturdy construction provides reliable flotation for children weighing between 30-50 lbs.

name: Youth Life Jacket
description: Ensure your teenager's safety with our Youth Life Jacket, designed for older children and teens. Offers comfortable fit with adjustable straps and durable zipper closure. High-visibility color and reflective detailing make it easy to spot in water. Suitable for various water activities for youth weighing between 50-90 lbs.

name: Adult Life Jacket
description: Stay safe on the water with our Adult Life Jacket, designed for maximum comfort and protection. Features adjustable straps and secure front closure for customized fit. Bright color and reflective strips enhance visibility. Ideal for boating, kayaking, and water sports.

name: Mambo Baby Float
description: Give your baby a fun and safe introduction to the water with the Mambo Baby Float. Features unique design for maximum stability and comfort. Ergonomic shape supports baby in natural swimming position. Adjustable safety harness keeps baby secure. Suitable for infants from 3 months to 24 months.

name: Swimways Baby Float
description: Introduce your baby to the joys of water with the SwimWays Baby Float. Designed for infants aged 9-24 months with large stable base and comfortable seat with leg holes. Adjustable canopy provides sun protection. Easy to inflate and deflate. Perfect for pool outings.

name: Laycol Baby Float with Canopy
description: Ensure your baby's comfort and safety in the water with the Laycol Baby Float with Canopy. Features dual air chamber for enhanced stability and adjustable safety seat. Detachable canopy offers UV protection. Suitable for babies aged 3-24 months. Made from durable non-toxic materials.

name: Beach Wagon
description: Make your beach trip effortless with our Beach Wagon. Designed to carry all your essentials with ease. Features sturdy collapsible design with spacious interior and durable wheels. Adjustable handle ensures comfortable transport. Perfect for hauling coolers, towels, toys, and beach chairs.

name: Sand Toys (set for 1 kid)
description: Unleash your child's creativity with our Sand Toys Set. Comprehensive set includes big shovel, 2 buckets, small shovel & rake, various sand molds, sand castle molds, small water toy boat, sand sifter, watering can, and water wheel toy. Perfect for endless hours of beach fun.

name: Shareable Sand Toys (set for 2 kids)
description: Double the fun with our Shareable Sand Toys Set. Expanded set includes 2 large shovels, 3 buckets, small shovel & rake, large sand mold, additional small sand molds, various sand castle molds, small water toy boat, sand sifter, watering can, and water wheel toy. Encourages sharing and cooperative play.

name: Corn Hole Game
description: Bring the fun of Corn Hole to your beach day or backyard gathering. Classic game includes two durable boards, eight bean bags, and convenient carry bag. Sturdy boards built to withstand outdoor conditions. Ideal for all ages and perfect for quality time with family and friends.

name: Single Kayak
description: Stable single-person kayak perfect for exploring. Features stable design, included paddle, storage compartment, and lightweight construction for easy transport.

name: Stand-up Paddleboard
description: Inflatable SUP board with pump and paddle. Features inflatable design, included pump and paddle, and repair kit. Perfect for water adventures.

name: Life Jacket Set (4)
description: Coast Guard approved life jackets in various sizes. Features Coast Guard approval, multiple sizes, comfortable fit, and bright colors for safety.

name: Water Toys Bundle
description: Fun water toys including floats and games. Features multiple toys, safe materials, easy storage, and family fun for water activities.

name: Dream On Me Full Size Foldable Crib
description:
The Dream On Me Full Size Foldable Crib offers comfort and convenience for your little one. With its sturdy frame and easy assembly, it ensures a safe sleeping environment. The foldable design makes it perfect for travel, while the adjustable mattress support provides added versatility. Give your baby the peaceful sleep they deserve, whether at home or on the go.

Product Dimensions: 54"L x 30"W x 36"H inches, it meets ASTM and CPSC standards. Maximum baby weight limit is 50 lbs., *Includes clean Comfortable Mattress and Crib Sheets.

name: Dream on Me Foldable Mini Crib
description:
The Dream On Me Mini Crib, designed for both crib and playpen functionality with its quick assembly and patented rail design. Its compact and portable design, aided by a unique hinge system and lightweight frame with wheels, makes it the perfect travel companion. Safety is paramount with stationary rails and dual hooded, locking wheels, meeting ASTM/CPSC standards.

Product Dimensions:
40"L x 26"W x 38"H – , Maximum baby weight limit is 35 lbs., *Includes clean Comfortable Mattress and Crib Sheets.

name: Portable Bassinet
description: The Portable Bassinet provides a cozy and safe sleeping space for your newborn. Lightweight and easy to assemble, it's perfect for room-sharing or travel. Features breathable mesh sides for ventilation and a comfortable mattress for your baby's rest.

name: Slumbertod inflatable bed
description: The Slumbertot creates a cozy environment for your baby to sleep, whether at your Hotel/AirBnB or on the go. This portable sleep pod helps block out light and noise, ensuring a restful nap or night's sleep. Quick to set up and fold away.

name: Pack and Play
description: The Pack and Play offers a versatile solution for your baby's sleeping and playing needs. With its compact design and easy setup, it provides a safe space for your little one to rest and play. Perfect for travel or as an additional sleeping area at home.

name: Slumberpod (blackout tent)
description: Slumberpod, The Original Blackout Sleep Tent. The ultimate privacy pod designed to create a cozy sleep environment for babies and toddlers on the go. This innovative sleep solution offers a dark, quiet, and private space for little ones to rest, even in bright or noisy surroundings. The SlumberPod sets up in seconds and fits most playards and portable cribs. Its breathable fabric and mesh windows ensure airflow while providing a secure sleeping space. Lightweight and compact, it comes with a convenient carrying bag for easy transport. Ensure restful nights and peaceful travels with the SlumberPod.

name: Hiccapop Portable Pack and Play Mattress
description: The Hiccapop Portable Pack and Play Mattress provides a comfortable and safe sleeping surface for your baby. Designed to fit standard pack and play dimensions, it features a waterproof cover and breathable materials. Lightweight and easy to clean, it's perfect for travel or everyday use.

name: Bed Rails 2 Sided
description: Introducing the Regalo Bed Rails, a reliable and safe solution to ensure your child's peaceful sleep. Crafted with a blend of fabric and metal, these bedrails are durable and secure. The patented swing-down feature allows for easy access to the bed, while the long and tall design provides added security. Setting up is a breeze with no tools required, and the anchoring strap ensures stability. Suitable for twin to queen size beds, these bedrails are designed for children aged 2-5 years old.

name: Bed Rails 1 Sided
description: Introducing the Regalo Bed Rails, a reliable and safe solution to ensure your child's peaceful sleep. Crafted with a blend of fabric and metal, these bedrails are durable and secure. The patented swing-down feature allows for easy access to the bed, while the long and tall design provides added security. Setting up is a breeze with no tools required, and the anchoring strap ensures stability. Suitable for twin to queen size beds, these bedrails are designed for children aged 2-5 years old.

name: Hatch Rest 2nd Gen Sound Machine
description: The Hatch Rest 2nd Gen Sound Machine combines a night light and sound machine in one sleek device. Features a variety of soothing sounds, customizable night light colors, and a timer function. Perfect for creating a calming sleep environment for your little one.

name: Hello Baby Video Baby Monitor
description: The Hello Baby Video Baby Monitor keeps you connected to your little one day and night. Features include a 3.5-inch color display, night vision, two-way talk, and temperature monitoring. Easy to use and reliable for peace of mind.

name: Yoga Sleep Sound Machine
description: The Yoga Sleep Sound Machine offers a variety of soothing sounds to help your baby sleep peacefully. Compact and portable, it features white noise, nature sounds, and lullabies. Simple controls and long battery life make it perfect for home or travel use.

name: Summer Pop N Dine Portable High Chair
description: The Summer Pop N Dine Portable High Chair provides convenience and comfort for feeding time on the go. Lightweight and easy to fold, it attaches securely to most tables. Features a comfortable seat, adjustable tray, and easy-to-clean materials.

name: Inglesina Fast Table Chair - Portable High Chair
description: The Inglesina Fast Table Chair offers quick setup and secure attachment to tables. Designed for toddlers, it features a comfortable seat, adjustable safety straps, and a removable tray. Perfect for restaurants or travel.

name: Jeep Jogger Stroller
description: The Jeep Jogger Stroller is built for durability and performance. Features all-terrain wheels, adjustable handle, and spacious storage basket. Perfect for active families who love outdoor adventures.

name: Jeep Double Stroller
description: The Jeep Double Stroller accommodates two children comfortably. Features side-by-side seating, adjustable canopies, and ample storage space. Durable construction and smooth wheels make it perfect for twins or siblings.

name: Jeep All Terrain Stroller Wagon
description: The Jeep All Terrain Stroller Wagon combines the functionality of a stroller with the versatility of a wagon. Features rugged wheels, adjustable seating, and plenty of storage. Perfect for outdoor adventures with multiple children.

name: Travel System Stroller by evenflo
description: The Travel System Stroller by Evenflo offers convenience and comfort for parents and babies. Features include a reversible seat, adjustable canopy, and large storage basket. Compatible with Evenflo car seats for easy travel.

name: Evenflo Ride on Stroller Board
description: The Evenflo Ride on Stroller Board allows older siblings to join in on stroller adventures. Attaches easily to most strollers and features a sturdy platform with secure foot grips for safe riding.

name: Graco Snugnride 35 Lite LX Infant Car Seat
description: The Graco Snugnride 35 Lite LX Infant Car Seat provides safety and comfort for your little one. Features include a lightweight design, adjustable base, and energy-absorbing foam. Easy to install and perfect for newborns.

name: Graco Backless Booster Car Seat
description: The Graco Backless Booster Car Seat ensures safe travel for growing children. Features include a steel-reinforced belt path, adjustable positioning, and easy installation. Perfect for children who have outgrown their car seat.

name: Summer Infant, 3D Mini Convenience Stroller
description: The Summer Infant 3D Mini Convenience Stroller offers compact convenience for busy parents. Features a lightweight frame, one-hand fold, and compact storage. Perfect for quick trips and travel.

name: Fisher Price Baby Toys Package
description: The Fisher Price Baby Toys Package includes a variety of age-appropriate toys for your little one's development. Features colorful, engaging toys that promote sensory development, motor skills, and imaginative play.

name: Mega Bloks 80pc
description: Mega Bloks 80pc set offers endless building possibilities for your child. Large, easy-to-handle blocks in various colors promote creativity, motor skills, and problem-solving abilities. Perfect for young builders aged 1 and up.

name: Mega Bloks Table
description: The Mega Bloks Table provides a dedicated building space for your child's creativity. Features a sturdy design with storage compartments for blocks. Perfect for encouraging imaginative play and developing fine motor skills.

name: Fisher Price Cash Register
description: The Fisher Price Cash Register introduces your child to the world of pretend play. Features realistic sounds, lights, and interactive elements that encourage imaginative role-playing. Helps develop math skills and social interaction.

name: Vtech Turn & Learn Driver
description: The VTech Turn & Learn Driver brings the excitement of driving to life for your little one. Features fun lights, sounds, and a steering wheel that encourages imaginative play and helps develop motor skills. Perfect for toddlers.

name: Fisher Price Giant Rack-A-Stack
description: The Fisher Price Giant Rack-A-Stack helps develop your baby's hand-eye coordination and problem-solving skills. Features colorful rings of different sizes that stack on a central post. Durable construction perfect for growing children.

name: Little Tikes Tap A tune Drum
description: Introduce your child to the joy of music with the Little Tikes Tap-A-Tune Drum. Designed for little hands, it helps develop rhythm and coordination through fun, interactive play. Lightweight and easy to carry.

name: 6 Pack Colorful Toddler Toy Trucks
description: The 6 Pack Colorful Toddler Toy Trucks set encourages imaginative play and creativity. Features six different vehicles in vibrant colors. Perfect for developing motor skills and storytelling abilities.

name: Mega Bloks Spinning Wagon
description: The Mega Bloks Spinning Wagon combines building blocks with wheeled fun. Features a sturdy wagon base with spinning wheels and plenty of space for blocks. Encourages creative play and mobility development.
